comments:
3.3RC3

- start with a project that contains a valid ant .xml file
- add an empty file to this project with extension .xml
- show the Ant view, right click in it, select Add Build Files...
- select both the valid ant file and the created empty .xml file, OK
- the empty .xml file shows in the view as "Unable to parse", so select it and press Delete
  -> the following gets written to the .log:

java.lang.NullPointerException

Fixed in the AntView.
